summary:
"The Lord of the Rings" is a popular movie trilogy directed by Peter Jackson, based on J.R.R. Tolkien's book. The films follow Frodo Baggins, a hobbit, as he tries to destroy a powerful ring to defeat the evil Sauron. Each movie is named after a part of the book: "The Fellowship of the Ring," "The Two Towers," and "The Return of the King."

Shot in New Zealand, the trilogy was a huge project with a big budget. It was very successful, making a lot of money and winning many awards, including an Academy Award for Best Picture for the last film. Today, it's considered one of the best film series ever made.
title: The Lord of the Rings (film series)
